languages.text: "Схизма Прерывания Цикла отныне пресечена. Запрашиваю свершение процедуры огненных похорон останков священного корабля "Герметико"... и того немногого, что было когда-то архимагосом Амарнатом. ".
"The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting a fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."
languages.original_text: "Схизма Прерывания Цикла отныне пресечена. Запрашиваю свершение процедуры огненных похорон останков священного корабля "Герметико"... и того немногого, что было когда-то архимагосом Амарнатом. ".

traits.locale_text: "The Schism of Discontinuing of the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting the fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “循环终止造成的分裂已经镇压完成。在此请求将圣船‘隐士之舟号’……以及阿玛纳特大贤者的少量残骸进行火葬。”
languages.original_text: "The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting a fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: “循环终止造成的分裂已经镇压完成。在此请求将圣船‘隐士之舟号’……以及阿玛纳特大贤者的少量残骸进行火葬。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle est désormais aboli. Demande de funérailles ardentes pour le vaisseau sacré Hermetico... et le peu qu'il subsiste de l'archimagos Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: "The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting a fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: « Le schisme de l'Interruption du Cycle est désormais aboli. Demande de funérailles ardentes pour le vaisseau sacré Hermetico... et le peu qu'il subsiste de l'archimagos Amarnat. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Se ha frenado el cisma para interrumpir el Ciclo. Solicitando incineración de los restos de la sagrada nave, la Hermetico... Y de lo que queda del archimagos Amarnat».
languages.original_text: "The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting a fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha frenado el cisma para interrumpir el ciclo. Solicitando incineración de los restos de la sagrada nave, la Hermetico... Y de lo que queda del archimagos Amarnat».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「サイクル中断による分裂は今後抑制されるだろう。聖なる船ヘルメティコの残骸を火葬することを要請する。大賢人アマルナトの遺骨もだ」
languages.original_text: "The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting a fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: 「サイクル中断による分裂は今後抑制されるだろう。聖なる船ヘルメティコの残骸を火葬することを要請する。大賢人アマルナトの遺骨もだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Spaltung der Unterbrechung des Kreislaufs wird von nun an unterdrückt. Erbitte ein Feuerbegräbnis der Überreste des heiligen Schiffes Hermetico ... Und das Wenige, was von Erzmagos Amarnat noch übrig ist."
languages.original_text: "The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting a fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: "Die Spaltung der Unterbrechung des Kreislaufs wird von nun an unterdrückt. Erbitte ein Feuerbegräbnis der Überreste des heiligen Schiffes Hermetico ... Und das Wenige, was von Erzmagos Amarnat noch übrig ist."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Döngü Süreğinin Bozulumu bölünmesi de böylece bastırılmış oldu. Kutsal gemi Hermetico'nun enkazı ve... Başmagos Amarnat'ın naaşı için coşkulu bir tören düzenlenmesini talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "The schism of Discontinuing the Cycle is henceforth suppressed. Requesting a fiery burial of the remains of the sacred ship Hermetico... And what little remains of Archmagos Amarnat."
